bill_title: provide for an inalienable right to bodily integrity.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to provide for an inalienable right to bodily integrity. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That chapter 34-22 be amended with a NEW SECTION: Every person has the inalienable right to bodily integrity, free from any threat or compulsion that the person accept any medical intervention. A person may not be given preferential treatment for accepting a medical intervention nor may a person be discriminated against for refusing to accept a medical intervention.

action_log.status_text: Withdrawn at the Request of the Prime Sponsor
